page.title: 06HEALTH
page.content:
HEALTH
As a very small community, Stanhoe is not able to have its own medical centre but uses the doctors' practices in either Burnham Market or Docking. One of the Burnham doctors lives in Stanhoe. People without transport are able to make use of a community bus on Mondays and Fridays. Medicines are delivered regularly to the post office where they are held for collection. The nearest dentists are in Fakenham and Hunstanton. The nearest chiropody clinics are mobile vans visiting Docking and North Creake. Home Helps visit a number of old people, and nurses based on the practice at Burnham Market will attend bed-ridden patients. Handicapped people manage with help as above, plus willing friends and in some cases state help.
